Articles.Content:
The Jool Atmosphere Challenge

 

How low can you go? See just how low an orbit you can achieve for your brand new space station. the lower, the more awesomeness points you will get.

For this Challenge, you...

  • must create a space station in as low an orbit around cool as you can manage.

Bonus points if the station includes a Jool Atmospheric probe.

Post Questions/Comments/Pictures Below!
You've already posted three challenges and I'm still not seeing even you giving your own submissions in any of them. You know to post a challenge you must complete it yourself first, don't you?
all of them are either variable goals (like this one) or very obviously possible, so I don't need to. also, I can't find my laptop.

3 hours ago, Sharpy said:

You've already posted three challenges and I'm still not seeing even you giving your own submissions in any of them. You know to post a challenge you must complete it yourself first, don't you?

As I understand it, that part is usually only required if there is question as to whether or not the challenge is actually possible to do.  This one clearly is possible. 

On the other hand, the challenge is also so poorly defined that it's pretty much meaningless at this point. 

OP, please read the Challenge Submission Guide    and think things through more and post a LOT more details like how scoring would work, what you even consider to be a "station" for this challenge, and what mods are allowed or not.
